title: Estimation of grey box and black box models for non-linear circuit data

tldr.text: A number of methods are tested based on black box and grey box model structures or on a mixture of them, which are all implemented in a forthcoming MATLAB toolbox, to illustrate the importance of the use of custom (user defined) regressors in a black box model.

references.title: Multiple steps prediction with nonlinear ARX models
Nonlinear system identification with output error model through stabilized simulation
Fast approximate identification of nonlinear systems
Nonlinear black-box modeling in system identification: a unified overview
Nonlinear black-box models in system identification: Mathematical foundations
System identification toolbox for use with MATLAB
System Identification: Theory for the User
